SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DBName" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DSN" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DSN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Request ID" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_FCDI_REQUEST_ID#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fetch Folder" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_FCDI_FOLDER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Optional Arguments" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_FCDI_ARGS#
